description:
I will never welcome you here!" Airi`s words denying the transfer of male students to her school create a heavy atmosphere in the classroom. Shingo tries various actions in hopes of changing the situation, but all of his efforts backfire and the mood only grows more and more awkward. Among all this a cooking class begins, giving the boys a chance to regain their honor...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: きょぜつ色のクッキング
